text: Reply to last person who whispered to you (/r message)
Shows profile of specified player (/profile player_name)
Send private message to specified player (/pm player_name message)
Shows all available chat shortcut commands for current game area (/help)
Blocks specified player's chat and voice permanently until unblocked (/block player_name)
Invites specified player to current game (/invite player_name)
Mutes specified player's chat and voice for current session (/mute player_name)
Chat to all players in current game (/all message)
Unmutes specified player's chat and voice for current session (/unmute player_name)
Unblocks specified player's chat and voice (/unblock player_name)
Chat to players in current team (/team message)
Adds specified player as a friend (/add player_name)
